name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition
description: Skyrim Special Edition + SkyrimTogether on Proton with FAudio19_08 for working dialogue and music audio
notes:
If Steam executes a first time setup it may override FAudio. To fix this execute the following commands on the terminal:
1- cd ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim\ Special\ Edition/audiofix
2- ./install-audio-fix.sh
content:
files:
- audio_fix_zip: https://github.com/Kron4ek/FAudio-Builds/releases/download/19.08/faudio-19.08.tar.xz
- install_audio_fix: https://github.com/rockerbacon/lutris-skyrimse-installers/releases/download/1.8.1/install-audio-fix.sh
- skyrimtogether:
    filename: Harbor.exe
    url: https://github.com/SkyrimTogether/issues-launcher/releases/download/v1.0.6/Harbor-1.0.6.exe
game:
  appid: 489830
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/audiofix
    file: audio_fix_zip
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/audiofix
    src: install_audio_fix
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/audiofix/install-audio-fix.sh
- execute:
    file: $GAMEDIR/audiofix/install-audio-fix.sh
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/harbor
    file: skyrimtogether
- execute:
    file: $GAMEDIR/harbor/Harbor.exe
system:
  env:
    PROTON_NO_ESYNC: 1
  pulse_latency: true
  reset_pulse: true
